overview: Channel 1 Exclusive Cameron Marshall is working on the "Live and Raw" set while mediator Ryan Alexander instructs him on what the viewers would like him to do. In order to get hard Ryan plays Cameron several hot video scenes with porn favorites Cameron Fox, Tommy Blade, Marcos Pirelli, Antonio Madera & Dean Campbell. Once the show is about to wrap the two decide to give the viewing audience a special performance, and the built up frustration Ryan was feeling from watching Cameron explodes into some of the most furious fucking ever caught on tape!
title: In Your Face
